tidge
Don't confuse this version of Mercy with the retail version of the sword with the same name. I'm not enthralled by this Sword, although I won't argue against a potential re-roll (that is NOT Probability Control) while trying to make any kind of attack being useful. 10 points for this effect is definitely too costly for my taste, but it might be a good choice of a second Sword for the OP version of Gorgon, or for a Sword Bearer with whom you may plan on making mostly ranged attacks.
